> The diff coverage is `n/a`.

| [pandas/util/testing.py](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/18759/diff?src=pr&el=tree#diff-cGFuZGFzL3V0aWwvdGVzdGluZy5weQ==) | `82.32% <0%> (-0.2%)` | :arrow_down: |

------

[Continue to review full report at Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/18759?src=pr&el=continue).
